sub_title: Director | Executive MBA | Financial Services | International | Pensions | PhD Candidate
summary:
Directeur Pensioenbureau Centraal Beheer Algemeen Pensioenfonds

Director: Expert in (international) pensions and leading the team responsible for Centraal Beheer APF. 

Worked in the pension industry in different (international) positions and areaâ€™s at Akkermans & Partners, Centraal Beheer Achmea, Achmea International Business Center, Syntrus Achmea and for Centraal Beheer APF, since 2001.

Achievements: set-up multiple (international) pension funds, develop financial services solutions, acquire (institutional) pension mandates, client relations management, set up Pan European Pension Fund Network, develop (international) pension solution and strategy. 

Specialism: realizing a shared groundbreaking challenge that matters, inspire others & leading to move forward in complex processes, develop and define strategy, set-up new initiatives / business-models.
